name: Kirby And The Forgotten Land (GBC)
description:
Kirby and the Forgotten Land...

This is the first demake I've created!  It is part of a series of projects I do for YouTube. In this case I wanted to take you back in time to experience what the new Kirby game would be like, if it had come out for the original Game Boy Color.

Subscribe to the channel if you want to be aware of more projects like this. Remember to share your photos or screenshots with me on social media if you've played it!

  • First level of the Switch game
  • You can play it on a real gameboy or in your smartphone
  • Has most of the mechanics of the original
  • A few minutes of playtime depending on how fast you play

Support me on Patreon and get: 

-  Your name in the video credits or projects

- Behind the scenes

 - Early Access to source codes

- Special Discord  bonus channels 

- And more!
